import React from 'react' import './Style.css' function Conversation() { const messages = [ { text: 'Hello!', sender: 'sender' }, { text: 'Hi there !', sender: 'recipient' }, { text: 'How are you?', sender: 'sender' }, { text: 'ach tma al3chir kaynchi wla hi frchi chno derti m3a dak tota li 3ndha mskouta had dria mskouna 3a9li m3aha tfouta lila m3aha skhonaa , 3ar rbek kari 3wa lyouma ntero ki 3wa m3a ndir formation bach nweli professional tota point final ?', sender: 'sender' }, { text: 'ach tma al3chir kaynchi wla hi frchi chno derti m3a dak tota li 3ndha mskouta had dria mskouna 3a9li m3aha tfouta lila m3aha skhonaa , 3ar rbek kari 3wa lyouma ntero ki 3wa m3a ndir formation bach nweli professional tota point final ?', sender: 'sender' }, { text: 'ach tma al3chir kaynchi wla hi frchi chno derti m3a dak tota li 3ndha mskouta had dria mskouna 3a9li m3aha tfouta lila m3aha skhonaa , 3ar rbek kari 3wa lyouma ntero ki 3wa m3a ndir formation bach nweli professional tota point final ach tma al3chir kaynchi wla hi frchi chno derti m3a dak tota li 3ndha mskouta had dria mskouna 3a9li m3aha tfouta lila m3aha skhonaa , 3ar rbek kari 3wa lyouma ntero ki 3wa m3a ndir formation bach nweli professional tota point final ?', sender: 'recipient' }, ]; return ( <>
{messages.map((message, index) => (
{message.text}
))}
) } export default Conversation
